alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 4:31PM CST until November 29 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CST FOR NORTHERN MARION...SOUTHERN LAWRENCE AND SOUTHERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 430 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Oak Vale, or 13 miles northwest of Columbia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Society Hill and Goss around 440 PM CST. Bunker Hill around 445 PM CST. Carson around 450 PM CST. Improve around 455 PM CST. Melba around 505 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Bassfield. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
